name: Twitter Blue Header (Looks like iOS App)
description: Changes boring grey header to blue! Makes the sidebar move to right side! Looks like the iOS App, and Mobile site! The original version of the tweak is Twitter iOS Style Header #NewNewTwitter.
additional_info:
v1 - Blue header
v2 - Used actual iOS Header
v3 - Fixed dropdown menu bug.
v4 - Changed the dropdown menu colour to the Twitter blue.
v4.1 - Update after Twitter change the spry.
v5 - Spy fixed again, new Twitter bird, now white on the menu.
